text:
(A group a persones approach you)
Hello UwU
you look like you're not from our Catpus UwU
I would advise you to go elsewhere UwU
Or we might scratch your nice face UwU

answers.text: So, are you the guy who tag a cathedral ?
So, are you some kind of anarchist ?
So, I get that you are anarchist but why the cat and U...U struff it just make you cringy as hell
Ok, have a nice day, U...U

text: Listen, as nyanachiste, we don't like religions UwU
they serve only to dominate peoples UwU
So we write some peace message on they builing of hate UwU
Now leave before we scratch your joly face UwU

answers.text: Ok, have a nice day, U...U

nyanarchist.text: It's in memory of an old anarchist, let me tell you her story
